name: @fooloomanzoo/property-mixins
description: mixin for custom elements to extends property mixins for data formats

scripts.prepublish: npm run analyze && git add . && git commit -m "publish new version" && npm version patch && git push
scripts.analyze: polymer analyze -i datetime-mixin.html color-mixin.html intl-date-format-mixin.html intl-number-format-mixin.html number-utilities.html range-mixin.html > analysis.json

author: fooloomanzoo
